translation: ○Third (Miscellaneous Dharma) Chapter of the Abbot as a Part of Circulation (2) First, the title of the chapter, and second, the text (2) First, the title indicates the text, and second, the explanation under the explanation (2) First, the meaning is divided into two parts, and second, the explanation under the explanation follows the text (2) First, the practice protects the circulation (2) First, the general list, and second, the explanation under the first part is specific (5) First, the six recollections, the two kinds of white dharmas, and third, the making of the remaining food dharma, and fourth, the method of gathering the teacher's resources, and fifth, the method of admonishing and stopping the making of two offenses, and second, the circulation under the second part of the teaching.
